airdrop.hero.title: AESC Ecosystem Launch Airdrop
airdrop.hero.description: Get early access to future agricultural ecosystem benefits, sow and reap with us!
airdrop.valueProps.title: Why Participate in This Airdrop?
airdrop.valueProps.prop1.title: Early Ecosystem Benefits
airdrop.valueProps.prop1.description: Get AESC tokens for free, become an early member of AGRI-ECO SMART CHAIN, and share ecosystem development dividends
airdrop.valueProps.prop2.title: Early Experience Opportunity
airdrop.valueProps.prop2.description: Airdrop participants will have priority access to beta testing of new products after mainnet launch
airdrop.valueProps.prop3.title: Knowledge & Social Recognition
airdrop.valueProps.prop3.description: Complete knowledge tasks, prove you are a pioneer in agricultural technology, and earn the community "Early Builder" identity badge
airdrop.timeline.title: Key Event Timeline
airdrop.steps.title: How to Participate in Airdrop (Step-by-Step Guide)
airdrop.steps.step1.title: Airdrop Design & Task List
airdrop.steps.step1.description: The event will be published on professional airdrop platforms (such as Galxe) for automated task verification and points tracking
airdrop.steps.step1.task1.item4: Subscribe to the official YouTube channel
airdrop.steps.step1.task2.item1: Retweet official Twitter posts and tag 3 friends
airdrop.steps.step1.task2.item2: Introduce yourself in designated Discord channel
airdrop.steps.step1.task3.item1: Post an original tweet / X post about the project (minimum 100 words with image)
airdrop.steps.step1.task3.item2: Create a short video about the project (TikTok / YouTube Shorts)
airdrop.steps.step2.title: Points Ranking & Eligibility Distribution
airdrop.steps.step2.description: After the event ends, only participants with a total score exceeding 100 points will be eligible for the airdrop
airdrop.steps.step2.detail1.label: Event Duration
airdrop.steps.step2.detail2.label: Eligibility Threshold
airdrop.steps.step2.detail3.label: Distribution Mechanism
airdrop.steps.step2.detail3.value: 1 point = 1 token, more work = more rewards
airdrop.steps.step3.title: Token Release Details
airdrop.steps.step3.description: To prevent tokens from being sold immediately after receipt, airdrop tokens will adopt a lock-up + linear release mechanism
airdrop.steps.step3.example: Example: User A receives 6000 airdrop tokens → 1st month after exchange listing: 0 tokens released → Starting from 2nd month, 6 consecutive months, 1000 tokens released per month
airdrop.steps.step4.title: Anti-Cheating & Security Measures
airdrop.steps.step4.description: Key measures to ensure airdrop rewards are properly distributed
airdrop.steps.step4.measure1.title: Wallet Screening
airdrop.steps.step4.measure1.description: Automatically screen participating addresses, excluding exchange cold wallets, whale wallets, and suspected Sybil attack addresses
airdrop.steps.step4.measure2.title: Task Verification
airdrop.steps.step4.measure2.description: Use airdrop platform API to ensure tasks are genuinely completed and remain valid throughout the event
airdrop.steps.step4.measure3.title: Manual Review
airdrop.steps.step4.measure3.description: High-value tasks like content creation are manually reviewed by the team to ensure content quality
airdrop.cta.title: Don't miss the opportunity to become a founding member of the AESC community!
airdrop.cta.description: Act now, complete tasks, your early participation will be the seed of future rewards
airdrop.cta.button: Participate in Airdrop Now, Claim My Rewards
airdrop.faq.title: FAQ
airdrop.faq.q1: Do I need to pay a fee to participate in the airdrop?
airdrop.faq.a1: Absolutely not! Beware of any scam messages asking you to pay fees or send cryptocurrency. The airdrop is completely free
airdrop.faq.q2: Why are tokens released linearly over 6 months?
airdrop.faq.a2: This is to reward long-term community supporters, prevent short-term arbitrage, and ensure healthy ecosystem development
airdrop.faq.q3: Can a user create multiple accounts to participate?
airdrop.faq.a3: No. We screen for Sybil attacks through wallet addresses, Twitter and Telegram IDs. Any cheating will result in disqualification of all related accounts
airdrop.faq.q4: How can I check my points and ranking?
airdrop.faq.a4: After connecting your wallet on the airdrop platform (Galxe), you can view your points and ranking in real-time
airdrop.faq.q5: Can airdrop tokens be transferred or traded?
airdrop.faq.a5: Tokens will gradually unlock to your wallet during the release period. After unlocking, they can be freely transferred and traded

flagship.achievement2.label: Pilot crop yield increase

flagship.achievement4.label: Farmer financing cost reduction
investmentLogic.title.line1: We firmly believe that technology is the only way
investmentLogic.title.line2: to solve agriculture's core pain points
investmentLogic.description: Data silos, lack of financial services, imbalanced value distribution... These long-standing agricultural problems cannot be solved within the old paradigm.
investmentLogic.highlight: BLUEPINE establishes trust through blockchain, unlocks data value through AI, and ultimately builds a new generation agricultural digital ecosystem where every participant—from farmers to consumers—can benefit fairly.
about.hero.title: About Us
about.hero.description: We are committed to deeply integrating cutting-edge technology into the oldest industry, building a more efficient, transparent, and sustainable global agricultural future.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.description: To become a self-evolving, decentralized global agricultural digital ecosystem foundation. We firmly believe that the ultimate mission of technology is to empower all things, and we are committed to ensuring that every piece of land, every agricultural data point, and every participant's value can be precisely measured and fairly distributed in a foundation of trust.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: Through strategic investment, technology incubation, and ecosystem building, we systematically promote the innovation and application of blockchain, artificial intelligence, and Web3 technologies in agriculture. We seek and empower those entrepreneurs who dare to disrupt, working together to break through core dilemmas of agricultural data silos, insufficient asset liquidity, and fragmented service systems.
about.story.title: Our Origin
about.story.paragraph1: BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION was founded on a profound insight: in today's era where digital waves are sweeping the globe, agriculture—the foundation of civilization—remains sluggish in its digital transformation. We saw the ubiquitous "data silos" in the fields, witnessed the helplessness of smallholder farmers facing technological and capital barriers, and observed the value lost due to opacity in supply chains.
about.story.paragraph2: But we saw even greater opportunities. We saw how blockchain could bring unprecedented trust to agriculture, how AI could unlock the potential of dormant data, and how Web3 could build an entirely new paradigm of value sharing.
about.story.paragraph3: Thus, BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION came into being. We are not just a fund; we are a group of practitioners who firmly believe that technology can reshape reality. Starting with our flagship project, Agri-Eco Smart Chain, we are turning this vision into reality step by step, connecting wisdom with the harvest of the fields.
about.advantages.title: Our Unique Advantages
about.advantages.advantage1.title: Deep Industry Integration
about.advantages.advantage1.description: We go beyond financial investment, deeply embedding ourselves in the industry through our flagship project AESC, providing the most contextually relevant technological empowerment and implementation support.
about.advantages.advantage2.title: Top-tier Technology Insights
about.advantages.advantage2.description: Our team possesses top-tier technical expertise, enabling us to precisely identify a project's technical strength and innovation, and provide critical guidance for technical development.
about.advantages.advantage3.title: Global Ecosystem Network
about.advantages.advantage3.description: A global network of agricultural cooperatives, research institutions, exchanges, and financial institutions, providing unique market and resource connections for our portfolio companies.
about.advantages.advantage4.title: Long-term Value Co-creation
about.advantages.advantage4.description: We reject short-term arbitrage, embrace long-termism, and work with entrepreneurs to build great companies that continuously create real value.
about.cta.title: Ready to Shape the Future of Agriculture with Us?
about.cta.description: Whether you're an entrepreneur seeking investment or a partner looking to collaborate, we look forward to hearing from you.
strategy.hero.title: Investment Strategy
strategy.hero.description: We focus on the intersection of agriculture, blockchain, and artificial intelligence, investing in technology-driven companies that can reshape value chains and create real-world impact.
strategy.pillars.title: Our Three Investment Pillars
strategy.pillars.description: We firmly believe that the convergence of these three areas is key to solving systemic agricultural problems. Our investments center closely around the following intersections:
strategy.pillars.pillar1.title: Digital Leap in Smart Agriculture
strategy.pillars.pillar1.description: Driving revolutionary upgrades in agricultural production methods through the integration of IoT, robotics, and biotechnology
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area1.name: Agricultural IoT & Robotics
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area1.details: Low-cost sensors, autonomous agricultural machinery, precision drone operations
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area2.name: Agricultural Big Data & Analytics Platforms
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area2.details: Farm management software, yield prediction models, carbon sequestration monitoring
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area3.name: Biotechnology & Digital Agriculture Integration
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area3.details: Precision breeding and cultivation solutions based on genetic data
strategy.pillars.pillar2.title: Blockchain-Driven Trust & Asset Tokenization
strategy.pillars.pillar2.description: Building trust infrastructure in agriculture using blockchain technology, enabling digitalization of physical assets
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area1.name: Agricultural RWA
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area1.details: Tokenization of physical assets such as farmland, crop yields, and agricultural equipment
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area2.name: Supply Chain Traceability & Transparency
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area2.details: Verifiable data recording across the entire chain from field to table
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area3.name: Agricultural DeFi & Insurance
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area3.details: On-chain data-based credit scoring, decentralized insurance, yield derivatives
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area4.name: Decentralized Data Marketplace
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area4.details: Platforms enabling secure, compliant, compensated agricultural data circulation
strategy.pillars.pillar3.title: AI-Empowered Decision Making & Automation
strategy.pillars.pillar3.description: Leveraging artificial intelligence and computer vision technology to enhance precision and automation in agricultural decision-making
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area1.name: AI Prediction Models
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area1.details: Early pest and disease identification and warning, market price forecasting, meteorological risk modeling
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area2.name: Computer Vision Applications
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area2.details: Crop growth and stress analysis based on satellite, drone, and ground imagery
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area3.name: Intelligent Decision Support Systems
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area3.details: Personalized irrigation, fertilization, and planting prescriptions for farmers
strategy.criteria.title: Investment Stages & Criteria
strategy.criteria.stages.title: Stages We Invest In
strategy.criteria.stages.stage1.title: Seed & Series A
strategy.criteria.stages.stage1.descript: We primarily invest in innovative companies in their early and growth stages.
strategy.criteria.stages.stage2.title: Selective Series B Follow-on
strategy.criteria.stages.stage2.descript: For outstanding projects with strategic significance to our ecosystem, we continue to provide support.
strategy.criteria.stages.amount.title: Investment Scale
strategy.criteria.stages.amount.note: Typical single investment amount ranges within this bracket
strategy.criteria.looking.title: What We Look For
strategy.criteria.criterion1.title: Strong Team
strategy.criteria.criterion1.description: Founders with deep technical backgrounds and execution capability in agriculture
strategy.criteria.criterion2.title: Clear Value Proposition
strategy.criteria.criterion2.description: Clearly addresses core industry pain points we focus on
strategy.criteria.criterion3.title: Verifiable Technical Advantage
strategy.criteria.criterion3.description: Product/service with technical moats and quantifiable effectiveness
strategy.criteria.criterion4.title: Scalability Potential
strategy.criteria.criterion4.description: Possesses potential and pathway from pilot to global market
strategy.criteria.criterion5.title: Ecosystem Synergy
strategy.criteria.criterion5.description: Can generate synergistic value with BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION ecosystem (especially AESC platform)
strategy.postInvestment.title: Beyond Capital: Our Value Co-creation Commitment
strategy.postInvestment.description: We provide comprehensive strategic support to our portfolio companies, accelerating growth together
strategy.postInvestment.service1.title: Technical Empowerment & Integration
strategy.postInvestment.service1.descrip: Provide AESC platform technical integration support, share our AI models and blockchain infrastructure, assist with technical architecture optimization
strategy.postInvestment.service2.title: Ecosystem Resources & Network
strategy.postInvestment.service2.descrip: Connect with global agricultural cooperatives, large agricultural enterprises, research institutions, and potential customers, helping projects achieve rapid commercial implementation and market expansion
strategy.postInvestment.service3.title: Token Economy & Financial Model Design
strategy.postInvestment.service3.descrip: Provide top-tier expert advisors for projects needing token economic model design, and assist in connecting with exchanges, market makers, and other financial resources
strategy.postInvestment.service4.title: Global Compliance & Strategy
strategy.postInvestment.service4.descrip: Provide compliance consulting and strategic navigation in major global markets (especially in RWA and cryptocurrency regulatory frontier regions)

strategy.process.step1.title: Initial Contact
strategy.process.step1.description: Submit project summary through our website form
strategy.process.step2.title: Preliminary Screening
strategy.process.step2.description: Internal team review with initial feedback within 2 weeks

strategy.process.step3.description: If standards are met, initiate comprehensive due diligence on technology, market, financials, and team

strategy.process.step4.description: Due diligence report submitted to investment committee for final decision
strategy.process.step5.title: Agreement & Closing
strategy.process.step5.description: Reach investment intent, sign agreement, complete fund transfer
strategy.process.step6.title: Post-Investment Value Co-creation
strategy.process.step6.description: Launch comprehensive post-investment support program, grow together

strategy.cta.description: If your team shares our vision and is building next-generation agricultural technology solutions, we look forward to your application.

ecosystem.hero.title: Ecosystem Cooperation
ecosystem.hero.description: Alone we go faster, together we go further. We are committed to building an open, collaborative, and win-win global agricultural digital ecosystem. We invite you to join us in empowering the future of agriculture.
ecosystem.journey.title: Start Our Cooperation Journey
ecosystem.journey.description: No matter where you are in the value chain, as long as you share our vision, you are welcome to contact us. Our partnership development team will provide you with exclusive connection channels.
ecosystem.partners.title: Join Hands with Global Partners to Build a Complete Value Chain
ecosystem.partners.description: We work closely with leaders from different fields to jointly solve complex challenges and unlock the full potential of the ecosystem
ecosystem.partners.category1.title: Research & Academic Institutions
ecosystem.partners.category1.direction1: Jointly conduct cutting-edge research on agricultural AI models and blockchain protocols
ecosystem.partners.category1.direction2: Collaborate on field trials and data validation to promote technology commercialization
ecosystem.partners.category1.direction3: Jointly cultivate interdisciplinary talents with both agricultural and technological knowledge
ecosystem.partners.category2.title: Agricultural Enterprises & Cooperatives
ecosystem.partners.category2.direction1: Become implementation pilots and promotion channels for AESC platform technology and services
ecosystem.partners.category2.direction2: Provide real industry insights and needs to guide product R&D direction
ecosystem.partners.category2.direction3: Jointly develop blockchain-based green agricultural product traceability and brand value-added solutions
ecosystem.partners.category3.title: Technology & Platform Partners
ecosystem.partners.category3.direction1: IoT Device Manufacturers: Co-develop low-cost, highly reliable agricultural sensing devices
ecosystem.partners.category3.direction2: Cloud Service Providers: Optimize underlying computing power and storage infrastructure
ecosystem.partners.category3.direction3: Data Providers: Integrate diverse data including meteorological, remote sensing, and market information
ecosystem.partners.category4.title: Financial Institutions & Nodes
ecosystem.partners.category4.direction1: Exchanges: Jointly promote liquidity of AESC and related RWA assets
ecosystem.partners.category4.direction2: Custody & Audit Institutions: Ensure asset security and compliance
ecosystem.partners.category4.direction3: Traditional Financial Institutions: Co-design structured financial products to bring traditional capital into agricultural Web3 ecosystem

ecosystem.forms.form1.content1: Develop DApps based on Agri-Eco Smart Chain or platform APIs

ecosystem.forms.form1.content3: Become a validator node of Agri-Eco Smart Chain

ecosystem.forms.form2.target: Large Agricultural Enterprises, Agricultural Cooperatives, Local Governments, Agricultural Input Dealers
ecosystem.forms.form2.content1: Deploy and promote AESC solutions in your production area or customer network
ecosystem.forms.form2.content2: Jointly apply for government digital agriculture projects
ecosystem.forms.form2.content3: Become a regional equipment service and operation center
ecosystem.forms.form3.title: Capital Collaboration & Ecosystem Investment
ecosystem.forms.form3.target: Venture Capital Funds, Family Offices, Corporate Strategic Investment Departments
ecosystem.forms.form3.content1: Co-invest in high-quality agricultural technology projects
ecosystem.forms.form3.content2: Share deal flow and due diligence information
ecosystem.forms.form3.content3: Jointly launch dedicated funds focusing on agricultural Web3

insights.hero.title: Insights & Resources
insights.hero.description: Deep dive into industry frontiers, decoding technology trends. Here, we share in-depth thinking, cutting-edge analysis, and empirical cases on agricultural digital transformation.
insights.valueProposition.title: From Information to Insights, Empowering Your Decisions
insights.valueProposition.quote: The wave of agricultural digitalization is sweeping the globe, but clear insights are needed amidst the noise. BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION is not only a practitioner, but also a thinker. We are committed to unraveling complexity, transforming intricate technology, policy, and market dynamics into clear, credible, and actionable industry wisdom, providing solid support for your strategic positioning in the new era of agriculture.

aesc.participation.step1.content: Purchase AESC tokens to gain basic ecosystem rights. This is the prerequisite for participating in all ecosystem activities

aesc.tokenEconomy.title1: Core Overview of Token Economic Model
aesc.tokenEconomy.subtitle1: Multi-dimensional distribution structure balancing liquidity and long-term value
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation2.unlock: 10% unlocked at launch, remaining linearly unlocked over 12 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation3.unlock: 10% unlocked at launch, remaining linearly unlocked over 18 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation4.unlock: 50% unlocked at launch for market making, remaining linearly unlocked over 12 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation5.unlock: Unlock amount determined by community vote for risk response and emergency subsidies
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation6.unlock: Unlocked based on cooperation progress, up to 12 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation7.unlock: After completing tasks, linearly released over 6 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.title2: AESC: The Lifeblood of Ecosystem Value
aesc.tokenEconomy.subtitle2: Multi-dimensional utility design driving ecosystem value circulation
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility1.title: Payment and Consumption
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility1.description: Pay for data services, knowledge subscriptions, DeFi fees
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility2.title: Incentives and Rewards
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility2.description: Reward data contributors, content creators, community promoters
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility3.title: Staking and Governance
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility3.description: Stake to share platform revenue, vote to determine ecosystem development direction
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility4.title: Asset Anchoring
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility4.description: Serve as pricing and trading unit for agricultural RWA assets
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility5.title: Deflationary Burning
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility5.description: Part of platform revenue used for buyback and burning, driving value appreciation

aesc.roadmap.title: AESC Ecosystem Development Journey
aesc.roadmap.phase1.title: Complete team formation, technical architecture design, whitepaper release

aesc.trust.title: Secure, Transparent, Trustworthy
aesc.trust.audit.title: Smart Contract Audit
aesc.trust.audit.description: AESC token contracts and core ecosystem contracts have undergone comprehensive audits by renowned auditing firm CertiK
aesc.trust.docs.title: Official Documentation
aesc.trust.privacy.title: Data Privacy Protection
aesc.trust.privacy.description: Using federated learning and zero-knowledge proof technology to ensure user data is usable but not visible on-chain, compliant with GDPR and various national data protection regulations
aesc.trust.governance.title: Transparent Governance
aesc.trust.governance.description: All major decisions are made through community voting, on-chain records are immutable. Token release and usage are viewable in real-time

aesc2.testimonials.title: They Are Creating Value in the AESC Ecosystem
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial1.name: Zhang Wei
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial1.content: By uploading my farmland data through AgriData Hub, I earn stable AESC token rewards every month. I used these tokens to learn new techniques on AgriExpert, and my yield increased by 20%
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial2.name: Dr. Li Ming
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial2.content: I share agricultural pest and disease recognition models on the AgriExpert platform, serving thousands of farmers and earning significant income. AESC truly makes knowledge valuable
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial3.name: Maria Santos
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial3.content: After using TraceChain to provide traceability proof for my organic vegetables, product prices increased by 30%. Consumers can now scan QR codes to see the entire process from planting to shipping
aesc2.developer.title: Building the Next Breakthrough DApp for the Ecosystem?
aesc2.developer.description: We provide developers with comprehensive infrastructure to help you build and deploy quickly
aesc.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
aesc.faq.subtitle: Questions you may want to know
aesc.faq.q1: How to participate in AESC private sale?
aesc.faq.a1: Please ensure you have a compatible BSC wallet, visit our official private sale platform, and follow the instructions to complete the payment.
aesc.faq.q2: What is the token unlock mechanism?
aesc.faq.a2: Please refer to section 8.2 of the whitepaper, where different distribution parts have detailed unlock schedules.
aesc.faq.q3: Which currencies can I use to purchase AESC?
aesc.faq.a3: We accept USDT (BEP-20), please refer to the private sale platform announcement for details.
aesc.faq.q4: What value does the AESC token have?
aesc.faq.a4: AESC token value comes from real usage demand within the ecosystem, including data service payments, staking revenue sharing, governance rights, etc.
aesc.faq.q5: How to ensure the project's security?
aesc.faq.a5: AESC smart contracts have undergone comprehensive CertiK audits, team identities are publicly transparent, and project progress is regularly disclosed.
aesc.faq.cta.title: Become a Founder of the Agricultural Digital Revolution
aesc.faq.cta.description: Join now, you're not just investing in a token, but investing in a more efficient, fair and sustainable agricultural future
aesc.faq.cta.button: Participate in AESC Private Sale Now, Co-create the Future
contact.form.title: Send Us a Message
contact.form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.companyPlaceholder: Enter your company or organization name
contact.form.subject: Subject
contact.form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or requirement in detail...
contact.form.fileHint: Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX formats, maximum 10MB
apply.header.title: Project Application Form
apply.header.description: Thank you for considering partnering with BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION. This application form is designed to efficiently understand the full picture of your project. We promise strict confidentiality of all information.
apply.success.title: Thank You for Your Submission!
apply.success.description: We have received your application. Our investment team will complete the preliminary review within 2 weeks. If the project aligns with our investment direction, we will contact you through the contact information you provided.
apply.section1.title: Part 1: Basic Project Information
apply.section1.taglinePlaceholder: Clearly describe your project's core value in one sentence
apply.section1.logoHint: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, SVG. Maximum 2MB
apply.section1.coreField1: Smart Agriculture (IoT, Robotics, Big Data Platforms)
apply.section1.coreField2: Blockchain Trust (Supply Chain Traceability, RWA, RDA, DeFi, Data Marketplace)
apply.section1.coreField3: Artificial Intelligence (AI Models, Computer Vision, Predictive Analytics)
apply.section2.title: Part 2: Team Information
apply.section2.bioPlaceholder: Bio * (1-2 sentences describing background, achievements, and role in the project)
apply.section3.title: Part 3: Product & Technology
apply.section3.painPointPlaceholder: Clearly describe the specific problem you aim to solve and the current difficulties of your target users/customers
apply.section3.solutionPlaceholder: Describe your product/service in detail, how it works, and what makes it unique
apply.section3.technologyPlaceholder: Explain the core technologies used in the project (e.g., blockchain, consensus mechanism, AI framework, etc.) and elaborate on technical barriers or innovations
apply.section3.aescSynergyPlaceholder: Is your project planning or already integrated with AGRI-ECO SMART CHAIN? What synergies might occur in terms of data, technology, users, or assets?
apply.section4.title: Part 4: Market & Progress
apply.section4.targetMarketPlaceholder: Describe the geographic regions you serve, specific customer types (e.g., smallholder farmers, large agricultural enterprises, buyers, etc.) and estimated market size
apply.section4.competitionPlaceholder: List main competitors and clearly explain your core competitive advantages
apply.section4.milestonesPlaceholder: For example: pilot farmland area, user count, monthly active users, transaction volume, revenue, data volume, etc. Please quantify as much as possible
apply.section5.title: Part 5: Business Model & Funding
apply.section5.businessModelPlaceholder: Clearly explain your revenue sources (e.g., subscription fees, transaction fees, service fees, etc.)
apply.section5.fundingUsePlaceholder: Explain the main uses of the funding
apply.section6.title: Part 6: Material Submission
apply.section6.businessPlanHint: Supported formats: PDF, PPT, Word. Maximum 10MB
apply.section6.demoLinkPlaceholder: Can be a website, demo video link, etc.
apply.section7.title: Part 7: How Did You Hear About Us
apply.section7.source: How did you hear about BLUEPINE? (Optional)
apply.section8.title: Part 8: Agreement & Submission
apply.section8.confirmAccurate: I confirm that all information provided above is true and accurate
apply.section8.confirmPrivacy: I understand and agree that BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION will process the information I submit according to its "Privacy Policy" for investment evaluation purposes
